targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM describe_connection_jobs 
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND connection_id like $account_id AND status = 'FAILED'
group by status

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM describe_connection_jobs 
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND connection_id like $account_id AND status = 'TIMEOUT'
group by status

SELECT
  status, count(*)
FROM describe_connection_jobs
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND account_id like $account_id
group by status
ORDER BY status DESC

SELECT
  error_code, count(*)
FROM describe_connection_jobs
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND account_id like $account_id AND status = 'FAILED'
group by error_code 
ORDER BY count DESC

panels.title: Count of results delivered (pushed to rabbitMQ)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  resource_type, count(*)
FROM describe_connection_jobs
where 
    $__timeFilter(created_at) AND status = 'TIMEOUT' AND account_id like $account_id
group by resource_type
ORDER BY resource_type DESC

SELECT
  resource_type, count(*)
FROM describe_connection_jobs
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND status = 'FAILED' AND account_id like $account_id
group by resource_type
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
  resource_type, account_id, updated_at, error_code, failure_message
FROM describe_connection_jobs dr
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND 
  status = 'FAILED' AND
  account_id like $account_id AND
  NOT(error_code in ('ThrottlingException', 'AccessDeniedException', 'Throttling', 'TooManyRequestsException', '403', '401', 'InsufficientPrivilegesException'))
ORDER BY resource_type ASC

SELECT
  resource_type, account_id, updated_at, failure_message
FROM describe_connection_jobs dr
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND 
  status = 'FAILED' AND
  account_id like $account_id AND 
  error_code IN ('AccessDeniedException', '403', '401', 'InsufficientPrivilegesException')
ORDER BY resource_type ASC

SELECT
  resource_type, account_id, updated_at, failure_message
FROM describe_connection_jobs dr
where
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND 
  status = 'FAILED' AND
  account_id like $account_id AND 
  error_code IN ('ThrottlingException', 'TooManyRequestsException', 'Throttling')
ORDER BY resource_type ASC
